issue.title: Sandia hands offset from Atlas wrists

content.raw:
Can you enable contact visualization and make another video? This will help us debug the collision geometries.

We are using simple collision shapes to approximate the hand geometry to improve real-time performance. We can add and adjust the simple shapes if there are some problem areas.

We can also try to enable trimesh collisions for the sandia hands for development purposes, though I expect the simple shapes to be used for the competition.
